sourcesContent:
import React, {useState} from 'react' export default function TextArea(props) { const toUpperCase = ()=>{ setText(text.toUpperCase()) } const toLowerCase = ()=>{ setText(text.toLowerCase()) } const clearText = ()=>{ setText('') } const removeExtraSpaces = ()=>{ let newText = text.split(/[ ]+/) setText(newText.join(" ")) } const copyText = ()=>{ const text = document.getElementById("box-el") text.select() navigator.clipboard.writeText(text.value) } const handleOnChange = (event)=>{ setText(event.target.value) } const[text, setText] = useState("") let textWithoutSpace = text const styles = { Active: { backgroundColor: '#0c4c50' }, Inactive: { backgroundColor: 'white' }, } return ( <>

{props.heading}

Your text summary

* No. of characters(including spaces): {text.length}
* No. of characters(without spaces): {textWithoutSpace.replaceAll(" ", "").length}
* No. of words: {text.split(" ").length}
* No. of sentences: {text.split(".").length}
* Time to read: {0.008 * text.split(" ").length}

Preview

{text.length>0?text:'Please enter something in the text-box above to preview it !!!'}

) }
